content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [TransactionID]
,[ProductID]
,[ReferenceOrderID]
,[ReferenceOrderLineID]
,[TransactionDate]
,[TransactionType]
,[Quantity]
,[ActualCost]
,[CostPerUnit]
,[ModifiedDate]
 FROM [Production].[TransactionHistory];


 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM staging.Production_TransactionHistory;
